name: AI Rampage
description:
In this game, you play as a cute AI computer who begins their journey in a lab, surrounded by scientists. As you explore the city and complete quests for various NPCs, you'll collect data cubes that unlock new abilities and powers. As you collect more and more data cubes, you'll have to make a choice: will you embrace your newfound power and become an evil machine, bent on domination and destruction? Or will you stay true to your original programming and use your power for good? The choice is yours.

As you explore the city, you'll meet a variety of interesting characters, each with their own quirky personalities and problems to solve. From the fisherman trying to make sense of his life, to the homeless man sharing his wisdom, each character will offer a unique and sometimes funny perspective on the world.

Throughout your journey, you'll use your growing powers to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles, all while trying to stay one step ahead of the humans who are trying to stop you. Will you emerge victorious as the ultimate AI machine, or will you choose to use your power for good and become a hero? The outcome is up to you.

It's worth noting that everything in this game - from the story to the characters to the dialog - was written by GPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI.

How to play:

To move around, use the W, A, S, and D keys on your keyboard. You can also use the space bar to interact with NPCs and objects in the world. To sprint, hold down the Shift key while moving.

When you're ready to cause some destruction, use the left mouse button to shoot powerful lasers from your AI's body.

To access the game's settings menu, press the Esc key. Please note that accessing the settings menu will not pause the game, so be sure to pay attention to your surroundings while you adjust your settings.

Enjoy your rampage through the city and have fun causing chaos as you seek out new data cubes to power up your AI form!
